ErrorCode.FormSubmitting: The form is being submitted, please try again later
ErrorCode.InvalidFormLimitValue: Form type quota value is invalid
ErrorCode.NoFlowToDelegate: No approval step available for reassigning approval
ErrorCode.UnableToGenerateApprovalWorkfl: Unable to generate approval process, please check if the approval process is correctly configured
ErrorCode.OrganizationChange: Approval process error, reason: organization chart change ({0})
ErrorCode.FlowStateNotAllowToRevoke: The current status cannot be revoked ({0})
ErrorCode.UnitRoleNotFound: Approval error for designated unit role: Member of this role not found.
ErrorCode.NoFlowToApprove: Automatic approval skipped, it may have already been batch approved.
ErrorCode.FlowDesignAutoFixDone: Process design restoration completed, please refresh.
ErrorCode.FlowDesignAutoFixError: Process design not found, form design number: ({0}), process design restoration failed.
ErrorCode.NoFlowToRevertDelete: Automatic restoration skipped, it may have already been auto-restored.
ErrorCode.FlowStateRecordNotFound: Approval stage not found, Form Code: ({0}), User Code: ({1})
ErrorCode.FormFlowExist: This form number has already been used, so the process cannot be created.
ErrorCode.FormDesignSettingError: Form name: {0}, Field name: {1}. Form configuration parsing failed. Please contact the company administrator (form designer) to rebuild the field.
ErrorCode.InvalidTextFile: For security reasons, if the .txt file contains disallowed characters: {0}, please use another file type such as .docx or .pdf. If you are unable to upload these file types, please contact the company administrator.
ErrorCode.FormDeleted: Form does not exist, you will be redirected to the previous page or the form tracking page
ErrorCode.ForbiddenAndContactAdmin: Insufficient permissions, please contact the administrator.
ErrorCode.FlowParametersFromComponentErr: Approval parameter error ({0}), unable to pass to the next approver.
ErrorCode.NextAutoApprovingError: Auto-approval error for the next step ({0})
ErrorCode.ForbiddenToRevoke: No permission to revoke this form (Form number: {0})
ErrorCode.FileDbNotFound: The file data could not be found in the database or you do not have access rights to this file, FileId: {0}
ErrorCode.FileBlobNotFound: The file data could not be found in the Blob storage or you do not have access rights to this file, FileId: {0}
ErrorCode.FileTicketInvalid: This download file ticket is invalid
ErrorCode.InvalidGroup: The specified group cannot be found (Reason: {0})
ErrorCode.CreateReachTenantFormLimit: Unable to add the form, as the custom form limit has been reached (Used: {0}/Total available: {1}). Please contact customer service if you need an increase.
ErrorCode.ErrorCode: Current form quota: {0}, forms used: {1}, forms available for restore: 0
ErrorCode.DuplicateRoleCodeException: RoleCode is reserved by the system or already exists, RoleCode: {0}.
ErrorCode.CustomRoleNotFound: Custom role for this permission not found, RoleCode: {0}
ErrorCode.ConflictDeliver: Approval process is occupied, please try again later
ErrorCode.InvalidApproverWithInvalidUnit: The unit is not in an active status, please contact the administrator for exception handling ({0}).

ErrorCode.InvalidApproverWithInvalidStat: Please contact the administrator for exception handling ({0}).
ErrorCode.FlowDeliverFailByOrgChanged: The next step has an invalid approver (e.g., resigned), please notify the administrator to review the exception form to avoid disrupting the form approval process ({0}).
ErrorCode.ManualForwardException: Manually transferred to an exception process state, executor: {0} ({1}).
ErrorCode.FormSubmitError: Form submission failed, please try again later.
ErrorCode.InvalidAppKey: The integrated product application key is invalid.
ErrorCode.TicketInvalid: The product verification key is invalid.
ErrorCode.FormLimitNotInitialized: Custom form quota has not been set.
ErrorCode.ShouldArchivedBeforeDelete: Archive first, then you can permanently delete.
ErrorCode.InvalidFileExtension: File format not allowed for upload.
ErrorCode.FileSizeExceed: This file exceeds the attachment upload size limit.
ErrorCode.MasqueradedFile: You cannot change the file extension yourself, please upload a valid extension.
ErrorCode.EmptyNewToEmployeeCode: The designated person for reassignment is required.
ErrorCode.FlowCurrentDeliverFailByOrgCha: Current approver is invalid, please notify the administrator to review the abnormal form to avoid interruption of the approval process ({0}).
ErrorCode.TimeRangeExceedLimit: The query time range cannot exceed ({0}) days
ErrorCode.FlowNotExist: Cannot find the process for this form number.
ErrorCode.FlowDesignNodeNotFound: Cannot find the process design, form design ID: ({0})
ErrorCode.FlowDesignNotExist: Cannot find the workflow design, form design ID: ({0})
ErrorCode.FormTypeCodeDuplicated: his form code is already in use. Please rename it. (Form code: {0})
ErrorCode.FormDesignNotFound: Cannot find the form configuration file
ErrorCode.AlreadyPublishedOrPublishing: This form has been published or is in the process of being published.
ErrorCode.PermissionError: Permission error, please log in again
ErrorCode.UpperPositionEmployeeCodeChang: Direct supervisor employee code has changed.
ErrorCode.CannotAddParallelApproverInAny: Single-step multi-person approval stage, cannot add an additional approver.
ErrorCode.Disabled: The API has been disabled, please refresh the page.
ErrorCode.FormNotFoundByFormNo: No data found for form number {0}
ErrorCode.FormNotFoundByFormObjId: No data found for form code {0}

UI.Frm_SaveTooltip2: Yellow dot: Data has been modified, but not saved yet
UI.Frm_SaveTooltip3: Green dot: Data has been saved
UI.Frm_BasicNote: You must complete the 'Basic Settings', 'Field Design', and 'Approval Workflow' settings before you can 'Publish' the form
UI.Frm_FormTypeCodeNote: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, with a maximum of 50 characters. The form code cannot be changed after it is set
UI.Frm_AvailableForApplicationNote: Enable: Immediately open this form for application; Disable: Close this form for application, but it will not affect the forms that have already been submitted
UI.Frm_ModalSaveReminderTitle1: Unsaved changes, please confirm if you want to leave this page
UI.Frm_ModalSaveReminderDesc1: Once you leave this page, unsaved data will be lost
UI.Frm_ModalSaveReminderError2: Please confirm if the 'Basic Settings' are correctly filled out

UI.Frm_ModalSaveReminderError4: Please confirm if the 'Approval Workflow' is correctly filled out

UI.Frm_ModalVerUpgradeDesc: To avoid affecting the existing published version, this change will be saved as a new version with the status 'Draft'

UI.Frm_ModalSaveReminderDesc2: Please confirm if you want to save these changes
UI.Frm_ModalSaveReminderDesc3: After saving, to avoid affecting the already submitted forms, some changes will only take effect on newly submitted forms
UI.Frm_ModalSaveFirstDesc: Data has been modified and not saved. Please 'Save' your changes before proceeding with 'Publish'
UI.Frm_CustomFields: Custom Field (Please click or drag from the left)
UI.Frm_DragDropNote: Add custom field, please drag the field component here!
UI.Frm_FieldKeyNote: The system generates a default random code, but you can customize it. Only alphanumeric characters allowed, up to 50 characters. Please ensure the code is unique.
UI.Frm_DescriptionNote: Description displayed in this position to remind users of important notes. If it's not a critical note, but just additional information, you can use the tooltip below for a smaller explanation
UI.Frm_PlaceholderNote: This is the placeholder text within the field
UI.Frm_TooltipNote: To learn more about Tooltips, click the 'i' icon on the right
UI.Frm_FileCountMaximumNum: Maximum Number of Files to Upload
UI.Frm_EmpFormatOption1: Employee ID / Default Name / English Name
UI.Frm_EmpUnitDynamically2: After selecting personnel, their unit will be displayed
UI.Frm_digits2: Select between 0-6. For integers, no decimal points, set to '0'.

UI.Frm_ModalSaveChangesDesc: After dragging, to save the order changes, please click 'Save'; to cancel the changes, please click 'Reset'
UI.Frm_SelectableRestoredFormCount: Number of Forms Available for Recovery
UI.Frm_AvailableRecover: Number of Forms That Can Be Recovered

UI.Frm_ModalConfirmDeletion2: Please confirm, once deleted, it cannot be recovered
UI.Frm_ModalSubmit3: Not yet submitted for approval, please confirm if you want to leave this page.

UI.Frm_ModalRetract1: Please confirm if you want to retract the form
UI.Frm_ModalRetract2: The next approver has not yet read the form. You can retract and resubmit the form. Please confirm if you want to proceed with retracting the form

UI.Frm_UploadFailedDescription: Please check if the network connection is working properly, or try uploading again later. If the upload issue persists, please contact customer service
UI.Frm_FilterFilterNote: By default, forms submitted within the past month are queried. If you want to adjust the time range, the query period should not exceed 180 days (inclusive)
UI.Frm_ModalSendNotnTitle: Do you want to send a reminder notification?
UI.Frm_ModalSendNotnDesc: If confirmed, a notification will be sent to the current approver.

UI.Frm_ModalRevokingApprovalDesc: The withdrawal request has been submitted. Please wait for approval from all approvers.
UI.Frm_ModalDelegateCrossDesc: Please reselect. For batch approval, the steps must be consecutive
UI.Frm_ModalDelegateDoubleCheck: Please confirm whether to execute proxy approval
UI.Frm_Error500Desc1: If the issue persists, please 'Report the Issue,' and we will address it as soon as possible
UI.Frm_Error500Desc2: The issue has been reported, and we will address it as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact customer support
UI.Frm_Error500Title3: Network connection failed, unable to report the system error
UI.Frm_Error500Desc31: 1. Network connection failed, the system cannot automatically report the issue. Please check your network or try again later
UI.Frm_Error500Desc32: 2. If the issue persists, please manually copy the error code and provide it to customer support. We will address it as soon as possible
UI.Frm_Error500Title4: The error code has been copied. Please provide it to customer support
UI.Frm_Error500Desc4: Please provide the error code to customer support, and we will address it as soon as possible. For follow-up on the issue, please contact customer support.
UI.Frm_Error403Desc: You don't have permission to access this page or resourece.
UI.Frm_Error451Title: Login expired. Please log in again
UI.Frm_Error451Desc: Not logged in. Please log in again to continue
UI.Frm_Error404Desc: Page not found. You will be redirected to the previous page or the form application list page

UI.Frm_ModalSubmitDesc1: To view the progress of this form, please go to

UI.Frm_FormTypeCode: Form code (for system identification and URL)

UI.Frm_ErrorCharacterCount: Minimum word count cannot exceed maximum word count

UI.Frm_ManageListNote: Please select the form before making changes
UI.Frm_ErrorMultilingualRequied: Multilingual settings have not been completed
UI.Frm_ModalDeleteA23Desc: After deletion, the applicant and related approvers will no longer be able to search for this form
UI.Frm_ModalMultilingualDesc: If multilingual support is required, please set up the necessary languages to ensure users have corresponding translations when switching languages
UI.Frm_QStGBasicStep1Desc: Please complete all the field settings in the basic setup first
UI.Frm_QStGBasicStep2Desc: After clicking save, proceed with the field design and approval process settings
UI.Frm_QStGBasicStep3Title: Click the button at the bottom right to open the 'Quick Start Guide' mode at any time
UI.Frm_QStGFieldStep1Title: Click or drag the required fields
UI.Frm_QStGFieldStep1Desc: Please click or drag the necessary fields from the list on the left to the custom field area in the center of the screen
UI.Frm_QStGFieldStep2Desc: Click the field to make more settings, or you can drag and drop to rearrange the order of the fields in the custom field area in the center
UI.Frm_QStGFieldStep3Desc: After clicking the field in the custom field area, you can make relevant settings for that field on the right side
UI.Frm_QStGFieldStep4Desc: Click the preview button to see how the form will appear when employees fill it out after being published
UI.Frm_QStGFlowStep1Title: Click or drag the required step
UI.Frm_QStGFlowStep1Desc: Please click or drag the required step from the step list on the left to the center of the screen
UI.Frm_QStGFlowStep2Desc: Click the step to make more settings, or you can drag and drop to rearrange the order of the steps in the center area
UI.Frm_QStGFlowStep3Desc: After clicking the step in the center area, you can make relevant settings for that step on the right side
UI.Frm_QStGFlowStep4Desc: Once the settings for 'Basic Settings', 'Field Design', and 'Approval Process' are complete, you can proceed to 'Publish' the form
UI.Frm_Error322: Conflict detected, please delete and re-add, or
UI.Frm_UploadNoteFileSize{{$n}}: File size limit {{$n}} MB, please adjust the file and re-upload
UI.Frm_UploadNoteFileCount{{$n}}: Up to {{$n}} files can be uploaded
UI.Frm_UploadFormatError: File format not supported, only the following formats are supported:
UI.Frm_ModalError322: Conflict detected, please restore the problematic fields to 'defaults'
UI.Frm_TextNote: Single-line text: Only allows input of one line of plain text, commonly used for names, phone numbers, addresses, emails, etc
UI.Frm_TextAreaNote: Multi-line text: Allows input of multiple lines of plain text, supports line breaks, commonly used for detailed descriptions or notes. Line height can be adjusted as needed to accommodate more text
UI.Frm_FormOrderNote: To adjust the display order on the 'Form Application List', please rearrange the order below
UI.Frm_ExceededRecoveryLimit: (Exceeded the maximum number of recoverable forms)
UI.Frm_FormLimitReached: Form quota is full, unable to add new forms
UI.Frm_QuotaReachedAlert: Quota is full. If you need to increase the quota, please contact customer service.
UI.Frm_ModalArchiveTitle: Are you sure you want to archive the form?
UI.Frm_ModalArchiveDesc: The form can still be recovered after archiving. However, after archiving, this form will no longer be available for submission, and past application data will not be accessible or exportable. Please confirm if you still want to proceed with archiving?
UI.Frm_ModalArchivedDesc: After archiving, you can recover the form from the "Trash".
UI.Frm_ModalUnableArchiveTitle2: The trash is full, unable to archive the form.
UI.Frm_ModalUnableArchiveDesc2: Please empty the "Trash" first, then proceed with archiving the form.
UI.Frm_ModalUnableArchiveDesc1: There are still forms being applied, so archiving cannot be performed.
UI.Frm_ModalUnableArchiveDesc3: Operation failed. Please try again or contact customer service.
UI.Frm_ModalCopyError: Form code is duplicated, unable to copy.
UI.Frm_ModalFlowUpgrateDes: The "Approval Process" has a new version. For a better experience, please upgrade to the latest version.
UI.Frm_LogicNote: Supports logical interactions between form fields, allowing certain form actions to be triggered when specific conditions are met for certain fields. A common example: When Field A (primary influencer) selects a particular option, Field B (affected field) will only show or hide. The settings here take priority over the default in "Field Arrangement.
UI.Frm_ModalLogicNote: Scenario example: When Field A (primary influencer) selects a certain option, Field B (affected field) will only show or hide.
UI.Frm_ModalLogicCondition: The following conditions must be met
UI.Frm_ModalLogicElse: When the above conditions are not met, then
UI.Frm_ConditionGreaterEqual: is Greater than or equal to
UI.Frm_ConditionLessEqual: is Less than or equal to
UI.Frm_FlowTooltipDefault: Click on the step and complete the settings in the "Settings" section on the right; if you need to add the next step, click the "+" button or right-click to add the approval step. If the approval process settings are completed, save and publish.
UI.Frm_FlowErrorNoSource: There must be at least one source connection
UI.Frm_FlowTooltipNoSource: There are unconnected steps; there must be at least one source connection. Please drag and connect the line from the red dot to the source step.
UI.Frm_FlowTooltipFieldIncomplete: There are incomplete fields. Please complete the step settings in the "Settings" section on the right.
UI.Frm_FlowTooltipBulkDelete: Multiple steps can be selected and batch deleted using the delete button at the top right.
UI.Frm_FlowTooltipAddNext: To add the next step, click the "+" button or right-click to add the approval step.
UI.Frm_FlowDesigneeNote: If the selection needs to be made by the applicant when filling out the form, create a 'personnel selection' field component in the form design, and then specify it here
UI.Frm_FlowApprovalStillSign: If the approver is the applicant, is their approval required?
UI.Frm_FlowGroupApprovalStillSign1: Yes, both the applicant and others in the group can approve.
UI.Frm_FlowGroupApprovalStillSign2: No, others in the group do not need to approve either.
UI.Frm_FlowGroupApprovalStillSign3: The applicant cannot approve; approval must be done by someone else in the group.
UI.Frm_FlowGroupMembers: Group members (if multiple, any one can approve).
UI.Frm_FlowMoreScenarios{{$n}}: There are {{$n}} more scenarios. Please check the settings on the right.
UI.Frm_FlowOrgNote: Approval can be set based on the applicant's department level.
UI.Frm_FlowOrgCondRequirement: Does the hierarchical approval require conditions?
UI.Frm_FlowOrgUpwardOption1: Based on the person's direct supervisor
UI.Frm_FlowOrgUpwardOption2: Based on the upper-level unit of the department. If the unit has multiple main supervisors, parallel approval (any one agrees) will be used.
UI.Frm_FlowOrgCondNoScenario: If there are no conditional scenarios
UI.Frm_FlowOrgCondDefaultDesc: To sign off with the direct supervisor, please enter "1"
UI.Frm_FlowOrgCondNote1: 1. Please first go to "Field Design" to create the form fields before setting the relevant conditions here.
UI.Frm_FlowOrgCondNote2: 2. If there is a conflict between scenarios or conditions, the highest-priority setting will prevail. For example, Scenario 1 > Scenario 2....
UI.Frm_FlowOrgHighestLevelDesc: If the initial approval after submission exceeds the highest approval level
UI.Frm_FlowOrgHighestLevelOption1: Scenario explanation: The applicant's unit level is N, and the set maximum approval level is lower than N. Example: The applicant's unit level is departmental, and the maximum approval level is set to divisional. (Department > Division)
UI.Frm_FlowOrgHighestLevelOption2: No approval needed (directly proceed to the next stage)
UI.Frm_FlowDUMembers: Personnel within the role (If there are multiple people, any one must approve)
UI.Frm_ModalFlowCondSet: To approve to this stage, the following conditions must be met
UI.Frm_FlowErrorNoEnd: Unable to find the next connected step, please connect to another step or end the process
UI.Frm_FlowDesignatedUnitNote: If the applicant needs to determine the approver when filling out the form, first create a 'Department Selection' field component in the form design and set it as mandatory. This will allow the approver to be specified here.
UI.Frm_ModalDeleteFieldDesc1: The system has detected that this field is being used for decision-making in the following locations, so it cannot be deleted
UI.Frm_ModalDeleteFieldDesc3: Please first remove the setting above. After removing the association, you can delete this field
UI.Frm_FlowErrorConStageNull: Please have at least one condition
UI.Frm_FlowErrorParallelStageNull: Please connect to at least one step
UI.Frm_FlowApprovalSeqNote: If there are multiple designated individuals, then
UI.Frm_FlowPositionOrder: Serial signing: based on the order of selection
UI.Frm_FlowAllApproval: All Approval: requires all individuals to approve
UI.Frm_FlowAnyOneApproval: Any One Approval: Only one person’s approval is required
UI.Frm_RelationalFieldHintDisplay{{$n}}: Because of the association with {{$n}} steps, it must be displayed
UI.Frm_RelationalFieldHintRequired{{$n}}: Because of the association with {{$n}} steps, it must be a required field
UI.Frm_RelationalFieldHintDisabled{{$n}}: Because '{{$n}}' is associated with this field, it cannot be modified. To make changes, please remove the association first
UI.Frm_ErrorLoginVerificationTitle: Login validation needs to be updated
UI.Frm_ErrorLoginVerificationDes: The system detected a different account login. Please manually refresh the page to update the login status.
UI.Frm_ErrorTokenExpiredDes: Please manually close the tab and log in again to continue
UI.Frm_ErrorFieldLoadFailedDes: Some fields failed to load during page loading. Please refresh the page
UI.Frm_SetFormCreatorDes1: 1. MAYO Form Administrator has the highest management authority over all forms. To add or adjust personnel, please go to the Apollo HR system.
UI.Frm_SetFormCreatorDes2: 2. Form Creator: The MAYO Form Administrator can assign personnel as Form Creators. The assigned personnel can create custom forms and automatically inherit the highest privileges for that form, becoming the Form Owner.
UI.Frm_SetFormCreatorDes3: 3. If the Form Owner field in the Form Owner list is blank, it means the form was created by the MAYO Form Administrator.
UI.Frm_WhoCanCreateForm: Who can create a form on the "Custom Forms" list page?
UI.Frm_EnterRoleNameCode: Enter Role Name or Role Code
UI.Frm_EnterUnitNameCode: Enter Unit Name or Unit Code
UI.Frm_EnterFormNameCode: Enter Form Name or Form Code
UI.Frm_FormAdminDes: The MAYO Form Administrator has default highest permissions. To add or adjust personnel, please go to the Apollo HR system.
UI.Frm_ManageFormRecordsAndAbnormal: Form Record Management (Approval Progress) / Exception Form Management
UI.Frm_ErrorMaximumCharacterCount: Maximum character count must not exceed
UI.Frm_AdminNonRemovable: MAYO Form Administrator, cannot be removed
UI.Frm_PreviewFlowDes: If there are any "error messages," please contact the company administrator or MAYO HR system customer support.
UI.Frm_DynamicListAddItemDes{{$n1}}{{$n2: {{$n1}} items have been added, a maximum of {{$n2}} items can be added
UI.Frm_DynamicListSetItemLimit: Set the number of items the applicant can add
UI.Frm_DynamicListFooterShowTotal: Should "Total" be displayed in the outer footer?
UI.Frm_DynamicListHeaderDisplayField: Should this column be displayed in the outer header?
UI.Frm_EditabilityDes: It is recommended to use with default values. You can preview to see the style effect.
UI.Frm_ErrorPageNotWorking: This page is not working properly. Please refresh the page later or go back to the previous page.
UI.Frm_ErrorPageDataNotFound: Cannot find the page/data you're looking for.
UI.Frm_ErrorInsufficientPermissions: Insufficient permissions, you will be redirected to the form application list page.
UI.Frm_AddApproverAction: In the approval process, the current approver is allowed to add the following procedures:
UI.Frm_AllowParallelAddition: Allow "Add Signature in Parallel" (requires all individuals to sign, so if there are multiple people in this stage, it is not supported)
UI.Frm_ModalUnableToAddApproverDes: Not the current approver, may have been reassigned, or another person has already completed approval.
UI.Frm_ModalForward Addition successfulD: One level has been added forward, you are no longer the current approver and will be redirected to the "Pending Approval Form" list page.
UI.Frm_ModalBackward Addition successful: One level has been added backward, you may continue the approval process.
UI.Frm_ModalParallel Addition successful: One level has been added in parallel, you may continue the approval process.
UI.Frm_Preview: You can preview the style effect
UI.Frm_ModalExternalLinkAlertTitle: Reminder: You are about to open the following link
UI.Frm_ModalExternalLinkAlertDes: This link will open in a new tab, and your current page will remain unaffected. Do you wish to open this link?
UI.Frm_AutoApprovalSettingsDes1: If an approver holds multiple roles in the same approval process (e.g., serving as a manager of multiple departments or as both a manager and a proxy), and if not selected, the default is "No merging of approvals allowed," meaning the approver must sign at each stage.
UI.Frm_AutoApprovalSettingsDes2: If the same approver appears multiple times in the process:
UI.Frm_MergeSameStages: Sequential or Same Stage Merged Approval:
UI.Frm_MergeSameStagesDes: If the same approver appears in both the previous and next stages, the system will automatically approve the next stage. In processes where all approvers are required to sign, the system will merge duplicate stages, allowing the approver to sign only once.
UI.Frm_AllowMergingAcrossStages: Allow Merging of Approvals Across Stages:
UI.Frm_MergeIntoFirstStageDes: If the approver has already signed in the first stage, the system will automatically approve any subsequent duplicate stages, meaning the entire approval process requires only one signature.
UI.Frm_MergeIntoLastStageDes: The system will automatically approve any previously duplicated stages, and the approver only needs to sign in the last stage, meaning the entire approval process requires only one signature.
UI.Frm_ParallelAdditionDes: If the current stage is a parallel approval (anyone can sign), "parallel addition" will not be available.
UI.Frm_AllowRejectionDes: If the approver in that stage "rejects," the request can be returned to any previous stage, allowing previously approved approvers to re-sign.
UI.Frm_ReturnToAllApprovers: Return to the previously approved approvers.
UI.Frm_ReturnSpecifiedStage: Return to the stage as specified by the approver.
UI.Frm_TableInitNote: Dynamic data source, cannot be viewed.
UI.Frm_FlowApprovalSeqNoteDU: If multiple designated units are assigned, then:
UI.Frm_FlowPositionOrderDU: Approvals follow the selected unit order, and any member within a unit can approve.
UI.Frm_FlowAllApprovalDU: Only one unit is required to approve, and any member within the unit can approve.
UI.Frm_FlowAnyOneApprovalDU: All units must approve, and any member within a unit can approve.
UI.Frm_DynamicListSetItemLimitDes: Set between 0 and 100. To disable additions, set it to "0." It’s recommended to set a default value (see "Field Settings").
UI.Frm_UploadFailedErrorFileExtension: Do not manually change the file extension. Please upload a valid file extension.
UI.Frm_ExportFieldSettingsNote: Select the fields you want to export. To change the order, simply rearrange them below.
UI.Frm_ErrorNoPermissionTitle: The page cannot be accessed by non-applicants or current approvers.
UI.Frm_InProgressDes: The process analysis is still being handled. Please return to the form tracking list first.
UI.Frm_SubmissionErrorDes: An error has occurred in the system and will be processed as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact customer service.
UI.Frm_PostSubmissionFieldsDes: Set 'Display' and 'Editable' fields during and after approval.
UI.Frm_PostSubmissionFieldsSetSeparately: If not using the default, additional configuration is required.
UI.Frm_PostSubmissionFieldsNote1: 1. Originally, in [Field Design > Field Arrangement], only the fields that the applicant can "display" and "edit" while filling out the form could be set. Here, you can configure the field settings after the form has been submitted for approval.
UI.Frm_PostSubmissionFieldsNoteApprovers: In Approval Process: Refers to the situation when the approver is actively reviewing and processing the form as part of the approval workflow.
Post-Approval Tracking (including process completion): Refers to the situation when the approver has completed the review, and the form is being viewed in [Form Tracking > My Approved Forms].
UI.Frm_PostSubmissionFieldsNote3: Default Value: "Display" is set according to the default properties of the designer controls; "Editable" is by default set to non-editable fields. Clicking "Restore Defaults" will return the settings to the initial state.
UI.Frm_PostSubmissionFieldsNoteApplicant: In Approval Process: Refers to the situation when the applicant has submitted the form for approval and the current approver happens to be the applicant, or an additional approver is assigned to the applicant (for example, to return the form to the applicant for supplementary materials).
Post-Approval Tracking (including process completion): Refers to the situation when the applicant views the form after the process is complete in [Form Tracking > My Submitted Forms].
UI.Frm_TooltipNoPermission: No permission, please contact the administrator
UI.Frm_ErrorImportFailedUploadValidFile: Please upload a valid JSON file.
UI.Frm_ErrorImportFailedFormLimit{{$n}}: Current form limit: {{$n}} forms. No more can be added. If you need to increase this limit, please contact customer support.
UI.Frm_CustomTemplatesNote1: 1. Custom form templates do not have data integration functionality. The data filled in by the applicant will not be written back to the Apollo HR system.
UI.Frm_CustomTemplatesNote2: 2. After selecting 'Apply,' the template will be copied to the 'Custom Forms' list page. Even if the template is updated later, the version of the applied form will not be updated synchronously.
UI.Frm_ErrorUploadFailedInvalidFormat: Format mismatch. Please upload a form design in JSON format supported by MAYO Form.
UI.Frm_PostSubmissionFieldsSetSeparately: Switching back to the default will clear any custom configurations. Are you sure you want to revert to the default?
UI.Frm_NODLConsecutively: You cannot download consecutively within a short period, please try again later.
UI.Frm_NetworkIssueDes: Please check if your network connection is working properly, or try again later.
UI.Frm_RoleCodeErrorMsg: Limited to alphanumeric characters, 50 characters max
UI.Frm_ErrorClientSideTimeOutDes: Connection failed, please check your network or try again later.
UI.Frm_AllowApplicantWithdrawDes: After the form is approved, the applicant can request a "withdrawal".
UI.Frm_SameAsOriginalProcess: Same as original approval process (standard process)
UI.Frm_CopyForwardProcess: Copy and apply from standard process
UI.Frm_BeforeDeliverDes: Used for validation before applicant withdrawal or approver's agreement/approval
UI.Frm_EmpDefaultCustomRange: Provide the following range restriction menu for applicants to choose from.
ErrorCode.FormDataConflictException: The form data has been modified by another user. Please reload the data and try saving again.
ErrorCode.ServiceInactiveForSiteUpgrade: Service is being updated. Please try again later(UpgradeCode:{0})
WorkFlowDynamicTable.ActionUser: Person Who Actually Performed the Action
WorkFlowDynamicTable.DisableRecord: Is it a Record for a Disabled/Non-transferable Stage? (Used for Displaying Differences)
UI.InvalidSubmittingStateCode: Process can only be submitted in "Pending Submission" status.
UI.SubFlowOnlyP3: Sub-process can only be executed in "Under Review" status.
UI.Frm_ModalCopyForwardProcessTitle: Please confirm if you want to copy and apply.
UI.Frm_ModalCopyForwardProcessDes: This action cannot be undone, do you want to continue?
UI.Frm_OnFormInitDes: Pre-design fields in the form designer and load data from external sources during initialization.
UI.Frm_EmpDefaultAllRangeDes: If no pre-fill is required, you can leave it blank.
ErrorCode.FormDesignReferenceError: A new version of the public form is available. Please refresh and proceed with customization based on the new version.
UI.Frm_ErrorDataStarLimit{{$n}}: Date must be on or before {{$n}}
UI.Frm_ErrorDataEndLimit{{$n}}: Date must be on or after {{$n}}
ErrorCode.RevokeFlowNotAllowed: This form is not available for withdrawal.
UI.Frm_ErrorNoApplyPermissionDes: You will be redirected to the form application list page. If you have any questions, please contact your company administrator.
UI.Frm_IllegalPatternsValidMsg{$n}}: The format is incorrect. Please input only {{$n}}
ErrorCode.StandardFormOperateDenied: The public form design is not editable
UI.Frm_AfterFormInitDes: Fields are dynamically generated and data is loaded based on the API response.
ErrorCode.NotAllowToAdminDelegate: This process status does not allow reassignment.
ErrorCode.NotAllowToAdminApprove: This process status does not allow delegation.
ErrorCode.NotAllowToAdminDelete: This process status does not allow deletion.
ErrorCode.FormSubmitErrorWithReason: Submission failed. Please contact the administrator. Reason: {0}
ErrorCode.CustomRoleUpsertFailure: Failed to create custom permission role. Role ID: ({0})
UI.Frm_ReFormInitDes: When the form is withdrawn and resubmitted, it connects to external data sources to load and set the data during form initialization.
UI.Frm_SkipStageIfNoAssignee: If there are no personnel in the stage, how the process proceeds
UI.Frm_AutoSkipToNextStage: Auto skip: The process will automatically proceed to the next stage
UI.Frm_PauseOnUnassignedStage: Stay on this stage: The process will remain at this stage, but since there are no personnel assigned, the process administrator will be notified
